ability.Lunar Aura: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Lunar Aura on its side for 3 turns. Under Lunar Aura, Lunar moves (Lunar Cannon and Lunar Dance) have their secondary effect chance increased to 100%.
ability.Bloo Burst: At the end of the turn when Lunar Aura is over, if this Pokemon's HP is at or less than a half, inspires Bloo Burst. Under Bloo Burst, all its moves have their power multiplied by 2.0.

Lunar Cannon.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's special defense by 1 stage. This move cause doubled effect to Fairy-type Pokemon.

Aura Sphere.effect: This move does not check accuracy.

Lunar Dance.effect: Raises the user's special attack and special defense by 1 stage. Has a 30% chance to raise the user's speed by 1 stage.

Recover.effect: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP.
